traits.name: Camouflage
entries: The jaculi has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

traits.name: Keen Smell
entries: The jaculi has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spring
entries: The jaculi springs up to 30 feet in a straight line and makes a bite attack against a target within its reach. This attack has advantage if the jaculi springs at least 10 feet. If the attack hits, the bite deals an extra 7 (2d6 damage) piercing damage.
